oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Eastern Airlines Stewardess presents Times Square Sign to Mayor West and Kermit C. Stengel, 1953
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Eastern Airlines Stewardess gives a Times Square sign to Mayor Ben West (pictured left) and Kermit C. Stengel (pictured right) at the Nashville Airport in 1953. Another view shows the men placing the sign in downtown Nashville at 6th Avenue and Church. Harvey’s Department Store is pictured in the background. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 2 photograph negatives : b & w ; 3 x 4 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: West, Ben, 1911-1974; Stengel, Kermit C.
